meanings.definition: A punctuation mark (:) used to introduce a list or explanation.
meanings.sent1: In my essay, I used colons to separate the items in my grocery list.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to use colons when writing down the steps of the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The colons on the page were like little signposts guiding the reader through the information.
meanings.sent4: Her use of colons in the presentation was like adding bright lights to a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The colons in the text stood out like bold markers highlighting important details.
